main.name: Rodrigo ZUNIGA
main.description: Programming lover who seeks to improve his skills and collaborate on large projects
main.bio: I'm a dancer at heart, a game development lover with an entrepreneurial spirit and a passion for coding. Born in Mexico City, I moved to France where I completed my Computer Science Engineering Degree at the University of Technology of Compiegne. I had my first Developer Experience at Faurecia as an Intern. After this, I started a new experience with Solganeo in an Apprenticeship by creating Salesforce Solutions.

resume.skillmessage: New Technologies are not a problem

education.description: I learned many aspects of Computer Science ranging from the basics of computing in different programming languages to more advanced topics such as IoT, cloud and distributed systems. I participated in small team projects like fully distributed Facebook using docker containers, desktop applications using C++ and QT. On the other hand, I was part of a team of more than 25 developers creating a stategy python game.
I learned the basics of structured and object-oriented programming as well as networks and databases. I made basic projects such as Java EE application and file traitement program using C.

work.title: Salesforce Consultant
work.description: Adapt Salesforce solutions. Within the startup I learned to lead developer teams and solve different types of problems in internal applications (Salesforce) or external (Node, Talend, Jenkins, ...). I made the migration of the website developed with PHP to a CMS (Wordpress) and I was responsible for the development of a web-push-browser application that allows sending notifications to clients subscribed to a web browser using Node.js.

work.title: SMS Custom Activity
work.description: Fix bugs and create new features with a Node.js application connected to Salesforce Marketing Cloud Journeys in order to send SMS.

work.title: Audit System
work.description: Finalize the web-based digital audit version, Adapt the system according to the requests formulated by our internal 'GIS' department, Provide feedback and modifications to comments made by users, Ensure the setting and correction of bugs

projects.title: Castle Raider
projects.category: RPG Game using Game Maker Studio 2

projects.title: Distributed Facebook
projects.category: Distributed FB using php endpoints and Distributed Algorithmes and docker network

projects.title: UTChat
projects.category: Chat Rooms applications using Java and JSP

projects.title: University Trombi
projects.category: React Application to search information about Computer Students and Researchers at the University

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.category: Resume created with React and deployed with Heroku PaaS

testimonials.text: If you’re passionate about something and you work hard, then I think you will be successful
